Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand have played 8 matches in the series and they are currently ranked fourth on the points table, while Sri Lanka have also played 8 matches in the series and they are currently ranked ninth on the points table.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium, Bengaluru is a balanced pitch. The average 1st innings score at this venue in the last 20 matches is 250 runs.
Chasing a target should be the preferred option at the venue, since the team batting first has only won 30% of its matches.
Light rain is forecasted which may affect playing conditions.
The venue is suited for both Pacers and Spinners alike.
Others: In the 101 matches played between these 2 teams, New Zealand Batters have earned the most fantasy points for their team, while All Rounders have earned the most fantasy points for Sri Lanka.
